short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly transfer prompts, images, and responses between devices, fueling your generative AI creativity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience ASK's game-changing Chrome extension, SYNC. Seamlessly send prompts, images, and responses between mobile app and desktop. Amplify your creative horizons by integrating with Midjourney, ChatGPT, Stable Diffusion, and other apps. This includes prompts generated by Genie and Primers. Elevate your generative AI journey with SYNC today.
